title: As of last patch my computer keeps freezing at the beginning of games and im getting tons of leaves
body: Title, my computer feezes and by the time i restart it and reconnect to the game, i reconnect just as the remake vote gets completed EVERY TIME. I know 100% as a fact that its not my computers fault because it runs fine and this has never happened before. I want to see this shit get solved next patch and I want my fucking penalties taken away cuz this is some class A bullshit.

replies.body: This has happened to some players after a recent Windows 10 update, where the Xbox game bar isn't interacting properly with league.  Disable the [Xbox Game Bar ](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) to get this fixed up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
